page.title: 11The Blacksmith of Laxton
page.content: The blacksmith in Laxton is called Herbert Martin.The shop he works in is over one hundred years old and the blacksmith has worked in the shop for forty one years now.He said that he works all hours when needed.When we went to see the blacksmith he was making some gates for a man who is a policeman.At the blacksmiths there was an anvil and we saw him heating some metal then bending it on the anvil.He used this metal for the gates he was making.The policeman who he was making the gates for,lives across the road from school.In the blacksmiths we also saw a power hammer which was just like a big hammer.We also saw a vice which is to hold things still while the blacksmith works on them.The inside of the shop was like a junk shop but the blacksmith knew where things were.
